111.content:
You're Jason, a 12 year old student. Science class has just ended and you were desperate to use the toilet. You dashed to the toilet, relieving yourself. Washing your hands, a jolt of energy shot through your spine, causing a pleasant tingle throughout your whole body. It felt great, as though it was a full body massage for your tired body. Though it was strange, you paid no notice to it and headed back home.

Throughout the walk back, something felt strange but you couldn't really pinpoint it out. Opening your door, you sat down to take off your shoes. That was when you realised, "Hmm... These feel tighter than usual..." you thought to yourself. Your shoes were a size 5, though your feet were more of a size 4. You remembered how your classmates teased you once in a while regarding your small feet, always flexing off how much bigger their feet were to yours. One of your best friends, Ryan, was quite big for his age. You were curious as to the reason why he was so big. Either he had an early puberty or was suffering from gigantism. Whatever the case, he had quite big feet for his age, size 12! You remember that he once asked you to compare foot sizes, yours only reached the ball of his, it didn't even reach his toes! He even asked you to wear his shoes, to which both your feet could fit into one! You could even wear his shoes while wearing yours! For your shoes he simply lowered his heel onto the mouth of your shoe. It was completely buried underneath his mammoth soles. His toes stretched far beyond the shoe's end. Your shoes were also far too narrow for his big feet. They were simply too wide! You both laughed as the comparison went on. Anyways, back to the topic. Typically, your feet had a bit of wiggling space within the shoe. However, the space was now gone. Your toes could also touch the end of your shoes naturally! You were excited, could this be the growth spurt you were waiting for?

You ran to your room and went to the wall where you always measured yourself. The last measurement for your feet was 2 weeks ago, at about 8.6 inches. Putting your feet against the wall, you could see that your toes covered the pencil markings. Now, your feet were about 9.6 inches! You were ecstatic. Your feet grew by an inch! You took the opportunity to measure your height as well. Surprisingly, it was not just your feet that grew, from 4 foot 6 you became 4 foot 8! Though it couldn't compare to Ryan's freakish 6 feet 3, at least you were getting there. The new pencil marks you made on the wall gave you a new found determination. You could finally be bigger than your classmates. You wondered if it was due to the jolt you felt just now in the toilet, but it didn't matter. You were growing, and that was all that mattered. You felt hungry now and went to cook lunch. Sitting down in front on the TV, you stared at your feet, slurping away at a bowl of noodles. You decided what to do next

1112.content:
Finishing the noodles, you got up to your feet and washed the bowl. Yawning, you headed back to your room and collapsed onto the bed your body sinking into the soft mattress.

[5 hours later]
*ring ring*
You groggily woke up, your sleep interrupted by your phone. Looking at the screen, you were excited now. Your best friend Ryan has finally returned from overseas! Funny thing about him is that you first met him when you were 8. You were being bullied by your classmates for your height when he showed up to help you. You were intimidated by his height at first, but you two soon became best friends. However, he had to move overseas near the end of the year. You remained in close contact with him online, chatting with him and asking him for help for any homework. He was both your best friend and the older brother you never had.

You always wished you were as big as Ryan. It was understandable why he was bigger than you, he was 4 years older than you. But even then, Ryan was still massive. He told you before that he was big for his age, towering over his classmates in his school. You remember how he once compared feet and height with you, your tiny size 4s with his size 12s. It was since then when you admired Ryan for his massive size and wished to have his big size. However, that was when he was 12. Fast forward 4 years, he was now 16, and your 12. You were excited and anxious to find out if he grew any since then, maybe by a few more inches. His height should have already reached its peak. You can't wait to tell Ryan about your new size. Size 6 feet and 4 ft 8, all thanks to the jolt you felt in the toilet.

Walking down the stairs, you sat down at the door, wearing your slides. You've had these since you were 6, a size 2, for little kids. But now, your feet were snug in them! Even the heel hung out slightly along with the toes. Looking at this, you then decided if you should head over to Ryan's house now or head over to the nearby shop to pick up some new slides.

11121.content:
Nah... Let's just head over to Ryan's house. You thought to yourself. Besides, maybe he has some slides that he can't wear anymore! You walked over to his house, which was about 3 blocks away. Knocking on the door, you couldn't wait to see how different he looks now. The door slowly creaked open, and when fully opened, you were simply face to face with his stomach. Everything above his neck was obscured by the doorway. He bent down and saw you down there and was overjoyed to see you. "Wow Jason! It's been so long man. How are you?"

Still speechless, you simply nodded, muttering the words, "So tall..."

"Come on in! My parents aren't in, we've got so much to catch up on!" he said as he walked to the living room. You struggled to keep pace with him due to his long strides. Sitting down on his sofa, you marveled at his size. "I see that you are shocked, why's that?" he asked.

"Are you serious? You're so tall now of course I'm shocked."

He chuckled, before responding, "Didn't I tell you before that I grew when I was away?"

"Yeah you did, but I wasn't expecting you'd grow so much. Jesus! How tall are you now? "

"Hmm... Last time I checked I was 7 feet 9."

Those numbers sank deeply. In a span of 4 years, he grew a foot and a half. It made those 2 inches you gained seem negligible now. Telling him to stand up and raise his hands, you could see that he was, extremely tall. He couldn't even fully extend his hands, both his palm were already completely touching the ceiling! Scanning his body from top to bottom, you saw his long torso. His shirt just barely covered his belly button. Similarly, his pants also barely covered his knees. Those were clearly not supposed to be shorts. Going further down, you saw his feet. If everything else was considered large, these were massive. Conveniently, both his feet were on the square tiles, his heels starting where the tiles were divided. Each were roughly a foot in length, more accurately a 11.8 inches. Yet, his one single foot occupied practically 1 half of the tiles. Looking at the line where the first tile ended, it was where the ball of his foot was at! "Dude what the fucks the size of your feet then?"

"Size 27, coupled with custom made size 27.5 shoes." "Won't be growing anymore, the doc said my growth plates have locked, he also said apart from being one of the tallest dude on earth, everything is normal and healthy." he added.

You were in disbelief. And the craziest part was that it was a natural growth. There you were thinking that those 2 inches could help you close the gap between him and you. But now, the height difference has not only stagnated, it has increased. You were slightly under his shoulder 4 years ago, now you were at his stomach. Looking at your own feet that barely reaches the floor, you see that your feet were roughly 4/5ths the length of the square tile. Measly, compared to his. Wanting to know more, you told him, "Remember how 4 years ago we did a size comparison? We've already done the height one now. I wanna see how much the difference will be for our feet." Ryan giggled, and agreed, grabbing his shoes, socks and also a pair of flip flops. You just grabbed your slides. Putting them all on the table, you could see that his footwear severely outsized yours. The socks in its unstretched length is longer than your slides, even if you minus off the opening on the socks. His flip flops were so big that you could place both feet side by side and fit in it. For his shoe, it was just massive. Before, you could squeeze both feet into his size 12s. Now, you could comfortably fit both of your feet into them with room to spare! "Now then, this is gonna be hilarious. Do you want me to compare with your slides first? Or do you want to compare with my stuff first?" Ryan said.

111211.content:
"Let me go first!" You said excitedly. You have always liked to compare feet and shoes with other people, how big theirs were to yours. Starting with his flip flops first, you had to use both hands to grab one of it as they were so big. Each one of his flip flops was so long that it was longer than your arm! Widthwise it was wider than your palms that were spread out. Standing on them, the length of your feet where the width of the flip flops! You could even place both feet within them and there was still space! Slipping your feet into them, you filled less than half the length of them! And there was so much space beside your feet as well! Trying to walk with them was hard. They were so much heavier than what you are used to walking with and constantly caused you to trip. Ryan was just laughing away, amused by how much smaller your feet was to his.

You tried the socks next, wearing it on one foot first. It vastly outsized your feet. You didn't even need to stretch the socks; they were big enough to wear without stretching. There was empty space around your feet, being so loose and all. That was when you tried putting your right foot in it as well! It could still fit and even stretch some more! You took your right foot out and wore the other sock. Seeing the loose socks, you pulled it up as much as you can, they went all the way up to your sheen and higher, and these were low cut socks! You decided to transition to wearing his shoes along with the loose socks.

Grabbing his shoes, which required both hands again, you first slipped both feet into them first, trying to reach the end of his shoes with your tiny toes. Reaching the end, you had a true sense of how long his shoes and feet were! Reaching the end of the shoes needed you to put your leg in! The mouth of the shoe was slightly below where your knees were at! Ridiculously huge!!! Putting your other foot into the shoe, lifting it up to walk was impossible, as your small feet just couldn't lift it up without slipping out of it. Thus you had to resort to dragging and walking, again, causing you to trip here and there. Looking at you in his shoes, Ryan said, "Haha, you look like a clown bro." Looking down, the shoes were seriously huge, extending out from your body by quite a lot. Taking off the shoes, you saw Ryan with a face that was in deep thought. Just as you were going to ask him why, he said, "Yo, could you lie down for a minute, I wanna see something." Obliging, you laid down near the sofa. Ryan walked over and took the shoes, placing the left one next to where the soles of your feet were at. Then, he placed the right shoe in front of it, heel to tip. He took the left shoe again and put it in front of the right. That was when he exclaimed, "No waaaaay..." and started laughing. Confused, you sat back up and asked what happened. That was when he said, "Dude! My feet are so big that three of my shoes are longer than you are tall!!" He said with bursts of laughter. Thinking about it, it would mean that if he were to put his feet tip to heel, he could practically cover your whole height in 3 steps. You were slightly offended by it, but deep down, you actually liked how Ryan was so much bigger than you, especially his feet. You loved how big it was, especially how long his toes were, how smooth those soles were. You simply replied, "Ugh, excuse me, I'm not the one with size 100 feet" to which he jokingly replied, "Size 27 actually. Well then, now that you're done with my stuff, how bout I start with yours? Though I'm sure that'll be over soon unless you got something else I can wear."

You were about to say that you had your slides only, but you remembered that you carried your shoe bag, as you wanted to play badminton after visiting Ryan. You fished it from the backpack emptying out the socks and shoes you were going to wear. Looking at them, Ryan simply laughed and said, "Wow! They're so tinyyy!" while putting them on his palm. You were shocked. All three of your footwear sat comfortably in the palm of Ryan! Your slides and shoes were side by side on top of each other while the socks were on top! You couldn't believe how big his palms were!

He started off with the socks first. Using both thumbs to stretch the socks, the thumbs were long enough to reach all the way into the ends of the socks, showing how small they were and also highlighting how long his fingers were! Already stretching them to its maximum, he could see that they were far too narrow to fit onto his wide feet. You stared on as they could at most fit onto the 2 toes. His big toe was really huge! He struggled to put it on, stretching it as much as he could. You could see the faint colour of the skin of his big toe through the socks. You could even see the individual fabric and stitchings of the socks as they struggled to adjust to the wide toes within. The Nike sign on the socks was distorted beyond recognition, clearly not made for a foot- no, a toe of such colossal size to wear it.

Taking them off, he moved onto your shoes. "I recall myself putting my feet over the mouth of them, let's see the difference today then!" he said delightfully. Before he wore them, he said, "Oh right, I should show you the shoes I wore back then, let's do that first before doing yours. He ran to the shoe rack, grabbing the shoes that he wore 4 years ago. You recognise the Nike shoes. "Size 12s" he said before putting his foot on top of it like he did with yours back then. You felt like it was deja vu. Except for the back part of the heel collar sticking out, the rest of it was again underneath his mammoth soles, the front being too narrow for his feet, again. If these were the same shoes he wore back then which were now covered by those huge feet, you dread to see how those will cover the same shoe you wore back then as well. He moved over to your shoes, dramatically and slowly putting his heel over your shoe. This time, even the mouth of your shoe was too narrow for his big heel. You went closer to take a look and saw the wall of the mouth of the shoe crunching up underneath his huge feet. They were simply too wide for them! Moving along his foot, you saw that the ends of the shoe barely scraped past the middle of his foot. Asking him to lift his foot slightly, you put the other shoe in front of it and asked him to lower it back down. His foot was longer than both your shoes! You also put them side by side and he lowered his one foot down on them again, keyword being one. They were both smooshed below his humongous feet and mind-boggling weight. You were utterly at shock about his size. Topping it off with the shoe, he added with sarcasm, "Oh right, you wore my shoes, so I should tryyy to wear yours as well!" finishing that, he took one of them and saw that even his big toe alone occupied the whole mouth of the shoe! He couldn't fit anymore toes within! He managed to shove his big toe inside all the way, with the heel collar being crushed by the ball of his foot. You moved over to touch the end of the shoe. Literally no space at all, not even to the side or the front of the toe. "How could someone's toe be so huge!?" you exclaimed. "Heheh, I know right, massive."

Taking it off, he finally moved onto your slides. Again, it was the same as your shoes, it reached to the ball of his foot. You were just in utter shock over how big he was, though within that shock, was amazement and wonder.

"You wanna compare feet too little man?" Ryan asked. Interested, you happily agree. You sat down opposite him, feet against feet. You were mesmerised. Your foot reached slightly less than the middle of his arch. Looking at the huge soles, you moved your foot towards the middle of them, amazed by how much larger they are than yours. You could see the soft soles on either side of your foot, coupled with his huge heel below and long toes above. You put both feet side by side at the longest part of his foot; it was wider than both your feet! Then, you moved one of your feet across the width of his foot, only to discover it was slightly longer than it was wide. and said, "Bro, both my feet combined aren't even as wide as yours! And even width wise, you almost win mine!" Putting both your feet on top of each other, they only reached the middle of his big toe. Speaking of which, you were attracted by the longness of his toes. You propped your foot up against his where his toe started. The big toe ended slightly below where the ball of your foot was! Moving it down slowly, your feet reached the widest part of his big toe. It was as wide as your first four toes put together! Moving further below, your first three toes were the width of the start of his big toe. Comparing toes, you also found that yours ended where the joint of the big toe was at. You told him the size of your feet, size 6 now. He merely laughed at the minuscule number as he constantly flexed his size 27 feet.

You were about to explode with shock and happiness. Firstly due to the huge size of his feet and overall size in general, but also because you probably had some fetish for feet or something. Maybe not exactly, you were more turned on by the fact that he was so much bigger than you and made yourself look so much smaller when you compared with him. You decided to tell him how you felt, about how you admired his huge size and his huge feet especially. He was accepting of your fascination and admiration. After telling him your feelings, you remembered the original reason you're here, the growth spurt. Telling him about it, you could see him laughing throughout, probably due to the fact that your growth was negligible to his. You also asked him for some new shoes and slides and stuff, to which he dug around for a while, finding a size 10 one. "I think these ones would suit you. If you were to grow again, I think you can wear them. They're still new, I barely wore them before outgrowing them." he said with a wink.

"Now what do you want to do Jason?" Ryan asked.

11121111.content:
30 minutes later

You were awoken by the sounds of the TV. Upon awakening, you were shocked that Ryan's feet were still on your face. You got up and looked at Ryan, who was looking at you with an amused look on his face. "Looks like someone enjoyed themselves. How's my feet bro?"

"Big and comfy. Like pillows on my face." Getting up, Ryan stood up in front of you. Staring at his stomach, you slowly tilted your head upwards, till it was nearly vertically up, he really was so tall. He also had to bend his head all the way down to look at you. Thinking of what to do next, you asked him, "Wanna play badminton in your lawn?" to which he replied with a yes. Turning away from him, you asked him to follow you to grab the rackets. While walking over to grab them, you don't know what part of your brain approved of such a decision, but you decided to just suddenly stop in front of Ryan while walking just for the laughs of it. This obviously turned out to be a disaster. This one stupid decision resulted in Ryan bumping into you and ultimately come crashing down onto you. Bones were broken and you could definitely taste blood in your mouth. Definitely not the best way to go down. Seeing your minuscule body below him, Ryan immediately got up and was extremely apologetic, and questioned why you would do something so stupid. He was about to call the ambulance when he started to hear creaking sounds. The feeling of the jolt of energy returned. You could actually feel the insides of your body repairing and fixing itself, while simultaneously lengthening as well. Ryan stared on in shock as he saw the scene unfold. As the growth slowed to a halt, you felt better than ever. You could also sense that you grew slightly as well, as your viewpoint had changed.

"What the fuck how?" was all Ryan said. You thought for a while, then concluded that somehow, the jolt of energy will happen when your body is damaged or injured and would result in your body fixing the injury and making you bigger as well. That would explain why you grew after the toilet as well, you sprained your ankle while running to the toilet, yet when you reached home you were absolutely unharmed. You must have been too caught up with your new size that you forgot about the sprain.

"Wow! You sure are one heavy and big boy! Your whole body covered mine!" You said to Ryan, after which you shared with him your theory.

"If what you said is true, then it can only mean that somehow, you have the ability to recover from damage quickly, along with becoming slightly bigger after the recovery."

You nodded at his response. "Wow but fuck, that was really quite a blow, it was like I was hit by a train! How heavy are you even?"

"Ugh... That I'm not sure, I haven't exactly weighed myself yet in a while."

"It's because, ugh... How bout I'll just show you, let's go together, we can get your new size measured as well."

Grabbing the tape measure, Ryan went to the bathroom upstairs, with you following closely behind. You stared at his feet while climbing the stairs, you couldn't take your eyes off them. Even when his toes reached the inner end of the steps, close to half of his foot still hangs out the back! You carry on fantasising about his huge feet.

Reaching the toilet, Ryan squeezed in, with you following suit. He helped you to take your measurements first, your height now being 4 feet and 9 and a 1/2 inches. A solid 1 1/2 inches growth. For your feet, it was now 10.3 inches, 0.7 inches longer. Ryan told you, "How about you go weigh yourself first." Obliging, you stood on the scale. This scale was a digital one, and was slightly inclined downwards at as it was activated by a spring mechanism at the bottom two supports of the scale. You had to step on it slightly first to trigger the spring before letting it to calibrate, then you could take your weight. You stepped on it first to activate the calibration, then waited for the ring before placing both your feet on it. You weighed about 80 pounds when you were 4 feet 6. Now, you were 100 pounds. "Hey, now it's your turn." you told Ryan. Looking at him now in the toilet, you think you could sort of understand what Ryan was trying to say. "You see, I haven't exactly measured my weight since my feet became much longer than the scale." You took the box the scale came in, and saw that it was only a shocking 7.8 inches long and 9.6 inches wide only! No wonder even your foot was longer than it. Looking at the weight, it could go up to 260 pounds.

"When I was still wearing size 12s, I could still weigh myself. But when I reached about size 16, my feet started to get too wide for them. I couldn't exactly fit both feet together onto the weighing plate. Size 27? I won't be surprised if I can't even fit one foot on it." As Ryan approached it however, you could see that his feet have severely outsized the weighing scale. He first hovered one foot above the scale first, the width of that foot had already taken up more than 2/3s the whole scale! Having him to put both feet slanted couldn't work, his big feet obscures the already small display of the scale! You then had him place both feet as close as they could to each other, being as straight as they could, while you would attempt to read off the scale from the gap between both feet. As he stood by the scale, ready to weigh himself, you simply popped your head between his calves, trying your best to observe the weight. You activated the calibration first. After it rang, Ryan placed both feet on top of it. His heels touched the floor, as his toes were as well as they stretched far beyond the weighing scale pad. The sides faired no better, his soft soles were hanging off to the side of the scales as well. As he stood on top of the scale, it was a miracle it didn't break, yet. As soon as he stood on top of it, the display immediately when blank, signifying how heavy Ryan truly was. Coupled with the blank display that came after Ryan went up on the scale, you could hear cracking and groaning sounds. Popping your head out of his legs, you could see visibly that underneath the excess feet that spilt over the sides of the scale, the scale was actually bending! Of the four supports of the scale, due to the incline from the front, the back two were actually supporting the majority of Ryan's weight! You could swear you could see them slowly get deformed and warped as Ryan's colossal weight was too much for this machine. Looking at the sides of them from, you could see that below Ryan's feet, the scale pad at the back was also cracking as it could not handle his weight. It was far too weak to hold up his immense bulk! He attempted to shift his feet slightly, wanting to place it such that they were in a 'V' shape. However, this meant shifting his weight over to his right foot. This led to the right half of the scale having to support his full weight, causing the front to crack and the supports front and back to bend even more as well. Having finished adjusting his left foot, it meant his right foot had to adjust as well. Again, placing all his weight on the left foot caused the same stress on the left half of it, causing further cracks and damage and excruciating sounds from the scale, as though it was begging for Ryan to remove both his large feet off of it. Now, having both feet in the V formation on the minute scale, he toyed with it a while more, shifting his weight front and back, resulting in more irreparable damage to it. You could also swear that the weight display had already broke from his feet. Apart from that, he had also repeatedly wiggled and curled his toes, just so he could get in extra damage. Just as he had enough fun, he stepped off the scale.
"Seems like a job well done if you were to ask me." he said with a cheeky grin.

What was at first a healthy-looking, albeit small scale, was now reduced to a dented, deformed and cracked piece of plastic. You could very well see Ryan's footprint or rather the parts of his footprint which could fit onto the scale, denting the plastic at places where he applied force. Due to his weight, you could also see clearly that the scale had bent in the middle, clearly unable to stop his rampage on the scale. The plastic display cover had been broken, probably by his toes which he had been curling repeatedly. You could also see that the front of the scale had dented and cracked, probably also due to his toe wiggling. The back was where the scale suffered the most. Upon pressing the scale, the calibration device couldn't even work, it had been destroyed in Ryan's destruction spree, crushed under his immense weight. The supports at both the front and back had also been crushed so flatly that there were no supports anymore. The back part of the scale pad had also been squashed flat by his heels. Lifting the scale up, you could also see slight cracks on the bathroom tile, probably due to his massive weight being spread out on the 4 small supports of the scale at first. Putting it back on the floor, Ryan simply walked over, and placed one foot onto the scale, and stood on it. The battle-damaged scale was no match against Ryan's size and, with its dying breath, groaned one more time before succumbing to its death, which was being crushed to pieces by Ryan's foot, cracking and crashing through the scale.

"You're an absolute monster. I swear."

"But you gotta admit, that was pretty fun."

"I hate to admit it, but yes, it was."

"What do you wanna do next? Ryan asked.

111211111.content:
"I want to try to grow more."

"If you give me the green light, I'll think of some fun ideas to get you growing."

"Go ahead, knock yourself out."

Making sure one more time that your injuries will heal, Ryan twisted your ankle. You yelped in pain, though the pain was short lived and resulted in you growing ever so slightly.

"Alright then, what's the best way for you to grow?" Ryan asked himself.

You gave it some thought as well, when an idea struck you. Walking up to him, your eyes were slightly above his stomach. You always liked how Ryan gave you a piggyback back then. You remember him saying that he never ever received a piggyback before in his life. He was simply far too big for people his age to carry. You had the ability to grant him the feeling and experience now!

You told him with a cheeky grin, "How'd you like a piggyback?" At first, he was shocked by your suggestion, but soon remembered that you technically had invincibility. Even if he was too heavy for you to carry, you'll just get bigger and stronger. You'll eventually be able to do it. You told him to sit on the bed, while you got into position. The springs groaned in protest as Ryan placed his mass on the bed, once again showing how heavy he is. Walking over to in between his thighs, you see that they both extended beyond your body, and his knees were almost perpendicular to the ground, showing his extreme height! You could barely wrap your arms around each of his thighs, and it was just ridiculous. Without having to even lift them, they were already at your torso, with each of them being more than half the size of your torso! Looking back, his upper body loomed far above yours, you could see how he was just laughing at how small you were, trying to carry a titan like he was. Telling him to lean onto you, you struggled to keep your self upright as you were now supporting the weight of his entire upper body on yours. His chest was being supported by your head, which you had to use great efforts to prevent your neck from just snapping from his chest. Even while sitting down, his feet were firmly touching the floor. You just had to carry his thighs and slowly move forward. Walking forward, you took one step at a time. You waited with anticipation to carrying his full weight. You took another step, propelling yourself further. But as this happened, Ryan's weight was now fully resting on you and you were only supporting it with one leg. You could literally hear your bones break as Ryan's weight was too much for you.
